name: anyappstart
description: AnyAppStart is a simple launcher that helps you organize and start self-hosted apps or services from a unified web dashboard. Itâ€™s easy to configure and ideal for managing local or cloud-based applications and scripts.
features: Unified Dashboard: Launch all your self-hosted apps from one central location. Everything at your fingertips.
Easy Configuration: Simple setup for organizing local and cloud-based applications. Get started quickly.
Service Management: Start and manage multiple services through web interface. Streamlined control.
Custom Launchers: Create custom shortcuts for applications and scripts. Personalize your workflow.
Web-Based: Access your app launcher from any device with a browser. Universal accessibility.
